Sentencas: Oxide ion conductors are important materials with a range of technological applications and are currently used as electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells and solid oxide electrolyzer cells.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5

Sentencas: Here we report the crystal structure and electrical properties of the hexagonal perovskite derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5. Ba3MoNbO8.5 crystallizes in a hybrid of the 9R hexagonal perovskite and palmierite structures.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5

Sentencas: This is a new and so far unique crystal structure that contains a disordered distribution of (Mo/Nb)O-6 octahedra and (Mo/Nb)O-4.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5
Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5

Sentencas: Ba3MoNbO8.5 shows a wide stability range and exhibits predominantly oxide ion conduction over a pO(2) range from 10(-20) to 1 atm with a bulk conductivity of 2.2 X 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5

Sentencas: The high level of conductivity in a new structure family suggests that further study of hexagonal perovskite derivatives containing mixed tetrahedral and octahedral geometry could open up new horizons in the design of oxygen conducting electrolytes.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conductivity in the Hexagonal Perovskite Derivative Ba3MoNbO8.5
